minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I appreciate your time today. We've made significant progress on the market strategy & competition analysis front.

minutes.speaker: David Chen
minutes.text: Consider regional differences What's your MRR looking like? I need to see clear unit economics.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your runway metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The runway extension timeline is tight, but we're confident about scalability.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Investor rejections are normal. Focus on improving your LTV metrics.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the training data issues and expect burn rate to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: David Chen
minutes.text: What's the international expansion plan? I'm seeing competition heat up in insurtech. What's your competitive moat and scalability?

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The due diligence timeline is tight, but we're confident about SaaS metrics.

minutes.speaker: Vikram Malhotra
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for POC.

action_items.task: Prepare detailed CAC and LTV analysis for Investor Pitch & Feedback Sessions
